column1: #Text=Tenzin says : " Your spiritual training has come a long way . "
#Text=Korra says : " Unalaq may be a horrible person , but his spirit powers are no joke . "
#Text=Tenzin says : " He taught you how to transform dark spirits .
#Text=Everything you 've done was meant to help me .
#Text=I am so sorry for turning my back on you as my mentor .
#Text=I need you now more than ever .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " I wo n't let you down .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " The ancient airbenders must have built this site .
#Text=If we meditate here , we 'll be able to enter the Spirit World .
#Text=" Korra says : " Why do n't you go first ?
#Text=" Tenzin says : " After all these years , my father 's dreams for me will finally come true .
